author: Linda Givetash and Matthew Johnson and Kurt Chirbas
title: 'Fight of a generation': Coronavirus could trigger violent unrest, Security Council warned
description: Millions of jobs have been lost and extremists and authoritarian regimes are taking advantage of instability, said Secretary General Antonio Guterres.
content:
The United Nations Security Council was warned that the coronavirus pandemic could trigger violent unrest, undermining efforts to fight the disease that has killed close to 100,000 worldwide.
Meanwhile, New York, the epicenter of the American crisis, saw a r… [+3330 chars]
